title: Cheesy sausage stuffed aubergines
ingredients: ['1 (600g) aubergine, halved lengthways', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '225g sausagemeat', '1/4 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/4 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning', '1/8 teaspoon black pepper', '2 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '450g pasta sauce or passata, divided', '120g grated mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 egg, beaten']
